                                            int stdid,
                                            java.lang.String stadesc,

                                            double staprice,
                                            java.lang.String staaddr1,
                                            java.lang.String staaddr2,
                                            java.lang.String staaddr3,
                                            java.lang.String statown,
                                            java.lang.String stacounty,
                                            java.lang.String stacountry,
                                            java.lang.String stapostcode,
                                            float stalet,
                                            float stalong,
                                            java.util.Date stastarttime,
                                            java.util.Date staendtime,
                                            java.lang.String staextlink,
                                            java.lang.String stalocation,
                                            java.util.Date staExpiryDate,
                                            java.lang.String stastatus,
                                            int staNoDays)
        This function used to save events and challenges into database. It will return just added or updated studio activity id.
        Specified by:
        saveStudioActivity in interface StudioActivityService
        Parameters:
        staid - A primary key that holds activity id.
        staname - Activity (event / challenge) name.
        stdid - Which studio going to conduct the activity.
        stadesc - Activity detailed description.
        staShotDesc - Short description about the activity.
        stastartdate - Activity start date.
        staenddate - Activity end date.
        stacredate - Activity created date.
        stamoddate - Activity modified date.
        staupdby - Activity updated person name.
        stagoalpoints - Activity attend points.
        stabatch -
        statypeid - Activity type(event / challenge).
        staimage - Activity image
        stainfluen -
        stalikes -
        staprice -
        staaddr1 - Activity held place (Within a studio / outside area) address line1.
        staaddr2 - Activity held place address line2.
        staaddr3 - Activity held place address line2.
        statown - Activty held town name.
        stacounty - Activty held coutnty name.
        stacountry - Activty held country name.
        stapostcode - Activity held place postcode.
        stalet - Studio latitude.
        stalong - Studio longtitude.
        stastarttime - Activity start time.
        staendtime - Activity end time.
        staextlink - Activity information external link.
        stalocation - Activity location place.
        staExpiryDate - Challenge expiry date.
        stastatus - Activity status.
        staNoDays - No of day that activity going to happen.
        Returns:
        last inserted or updated id.
